author: Igor Derysh
title: Meet the scariest Republican candidates of 2022: It wasn't easy to pick 'em

sentence: Perdue faces incumbent Brian Kemp, who has drawn criticism from Trump for Kemp's refusal to overturn the state's 2020 presidential election results.
author: Margaret Newkirk
title: Atlanta's New Mayor Dickens Seeks to Bring Unity to City Riven by Conflict
